ValidationRule.description: Can't pass the status from "Extracted/Integrated" to "To be extracted".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), NOT($Profile.Name = 'Thalys B2b System Admin'), ISCHANGED(B2b_Status__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(B2b_Status__c), 'Extracted'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(B2b_Status__c), 'Integrated') ), ISPICKVAL(B2b_Status__c, 'To be Extracted'), B2b_Bene_Extract__c = TRUE, B2b_GDS3_Extract__c = TRUE, B2b_Resarail_Extract__c = TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can't pass the status from "Extracted/Integrated" to "To be extracted".
